category.name: Product Structure.Product Structure Synchronization
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_Additional_Ref_Designator_Search_Criteria
preference.preference_description: Determines which properties users can add to the search criteria for the reference designator, within the same parent. Users can add any properties defined by this preference to search criteria within the same parent. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a valid BOM line property name.
